data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume White, William T., Ebert, David A., Naylor, Gavin J. P. (2017): Revision of the genus Centrophorus (Squaliformes: Centrophoridae): Part 2 - Description of two new species of Centrophorus and clarification of the status of Centrophorus lusitanicus Barbosa du Bocage & de Brito Capello, 1864. Zootaxa 4344 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.1.3|18 occurrences
